Articles.Content:
I was wondering what is the minimum altitude above Kerbin to receive High Kerbin Science. I'm doing a mission (actually right as I am righting this message:cool:) and I want to get as much science as possible. Thanks in advance

Edited May 6, 2015 by Branjoman

250km

This page has the boundary information for all the planets and moons: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Science
